name: Robo In Time
description:
Robo In TIME There is a robot in outer space who wants to achieve peace named "Cexxa". He is a special robot and has a friend named "Mexxa"(Next Coming Soon Gameplay). However, their peace can be destroyed because there is a barrier, namely "TheZmiles" which blocks the twists and turns of the steps to achieve Cexxa's peace. Can Cxxa achieve perfect peace? let's adventure 

Left Click Mouse : Play 

Right Click Mouse : Exit 

Level 1: Left Click Mouse 

Level 2: Right Click Mouse (ComingSoon) 

Back in Level 2: Middle Click Mouse Back in 

choose Level 1 or Level 2 : Middle Click Mouse 

Poor explanation: I still want to fix it when the Cexxa fell off the ground like a bugs, I wanted to find a way to fix it. Btw, I'm a solo developer ,it's possible that there will be development after that. Thank you.

Btw, this should have music, you can also play on https://liluo.io/instant-builds/c91019a7-c5cc-40c7-b14d-621308d806a1   in here, there's music and also i want to fix for music in the next development.
